title: RX-78-2 Gundam
notes: First Gundam type PG kit. Features LED for eyes (requires one CR1220 watch battery). Includes transformable FF-X7 Core Fighter and optional Core Block. First Gunpla kit to use "Earth Federation Space Force (E.F.S.F.)" as the official moniker for the Earth Federation Forces.

title: MS-06F Zaku II
notes: First Zeon Unit and sole mass production unit PG kit. Features LED for monoeye (requires one CR1220 watch battery). First Gunpla kit to use the official "Principality of Zeon" moniker.

title: MS-06S Char's Zaku II
notes: Color variant of PG-02.

title: MSZ-006 Zeta Gundam
notes: First fully transformable PG kit. Features diecast metal landing gear, LED for eyes and stabilizer (requires one CR1220 watch battery each), wing binders (uses provided BR435 pin type battery for testing), beam saber (includes one BR435 pin type battery), and shield (requires two LR44 watch batteries). Includes grenade launcher packs.

title: XXXG 00W0 W-Gundam Zero Custom
series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz
notes: First and only PG kit released from the After Colony timeline. Features diecast metal joints and LED for eyes and chest (requires two LR43 watch batteries).

title: RX-178 Gundam Mk-II (AEUG colors)
notes: Features diecast metal hip joint and LED for eyes and cockpit (requires two LR43 watch batteries).

title: RX-178 Gundam Mk-II (Titans colors)
notes: Color variant of PG-06.

title: RX-78GP01 Gundam "Zephyranthes"/Fb
notes: Includes parts to build either variant of the Gundam GP01. Features LED for eyes (requires one CR1220 watch battery) and diecast metal hip joint. Includes FF-XII Core Fighter II and FF-XII-Fb Core Fighter II Full Burnern, 90mm Machine Gun as seen in episodes 2 and 3 of the OVA, MS hangar, and figurines of Kou Uraki and two hangar personnel. Initial release of the kit included an Anaheim Electronics Gundam Project folder with Project GP01 Staff card.

title: GAT-X105 Strike Gundam
notes: First PG kit released from the Cosmic Era timeline. Features LED for eyes (requires one CR1220 watch battery) and diecast parts for the knees and hips. Includes Kira Yamato figurine and large "Grand Slam" sword weapon, promoted in Gundam Evolve 08.

title: FX-550 Skygrasper + AQM/E-X01 Aile Striker
notes: Add-on kit for PG-09. Includes adjustable display base that is compatible with this kit or PG-09 and a pilot figure that can be painted as Mu La Flaga, Tolle Koenig, or Cagalli Yula Athha.

title: MBF-02+AQM/E-X01 Aile Strike Rouge + FX-550 Skygrasper
notes: Color variant of PG-09 with PG-10.

title: MBF-P02 Gundam Astray Red Frame
notes: First PG kit released from a manga series. Re-uses inner frame of PG-09. Features LED for eyes (requires one CR1220 watch battery). Includes Lowe Guele figurine and a chapter of the Gundam SEED Astray manga. Initial release included clear armor parts, "Tiger Pierce" katana, and a stand to hold both the "Gerbera Straight" and "Tiger Pierce" katanas.

title: GN-0000+GNR-010 00 Raiser
notes: First PG kit released from the Anno Domini timeline. Features Gunpla LED Unit for eyes (two LR41 watch batteries included) and two GN Drives with lights and spinning flywheels (two CR2032 watch batteries included). GN Condensers on the arms and legs feature locking joints to support the weight of large weaponry and the 0 Raiser. Includes Setsuna F. Seiei and Saji Crossroad figurines. Initial release included 2 Way Stand Base for both 00 Gundam and 00 Raiser.

title: ZGMF-X20A Strike Freedom Gundam
notes: First PG kit designed by Hajime Katoki. Features LED for eyes (requires two LR41 watch batteries) and frame parts molded in three shades of gold (chrome plated, metallic painted, and injection molded). Includes Kira Yamato figurine and BA-7 display base. With wings spread out, it is the largest PG kit.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam
notes: Fully transformable from Unicorn Mode to Destroy Mode and kit-exclusive Destroy Mode Unchained. V-fin halves use internal magnets to connect in Unicorn Mode. Includes custom display base with weapon storage ports and a Banagher Links figurine.

title: RX-0(N) Unicorn Gundam 02 Banshee Norn
notes: Parts and color variant of PG-15; also features a Destroy Unchained mode. Includes Riddhe Marcenas figurine.

title: GN-001 Gundam Exia
notes: Includes Setsuna F. Seiei (normal suit, holding helmet) figurine, optional GN Condenser unit and display base that doubles as weapons storage and can hold the GN Drive separately. Released to commemorate the 10th anniversary of Gundam 00 and the 20th anniversary of the Perfect Grade line. Part of the Gunpla Evolution Project.

title: GN-0000GNHW/7SG 00 Gundam Seven Sword/G
notes: Parts variant of PG-13 with redesigned chest, yellow head antennas, and shoulders. Includes two Gunpla LED Units (requires two LR41 watch batteries per unit) for eyes and GN Buster Sword II, and clear BA-13 Action Base 1. Two CR2032 watch batteries required for GN Drives. Released to commemorate the 10th anniversary of Gundam 00.

title: GAT-X105+AQM/E-YM1 Perfect Strike Gundam
notes: Parts variant of PG-09. Features new head and armor parts with increased details and improved proportions.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam Custom Set #1
notes: Accessory kit for PG-01. Contains clear armor parts for the head, torso, waist block, left arm, and left leg, plus a light-up beam saber.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam Custom Set #2
notes: Accessory kit for PG-01. Contains clear armor parts for the shoulder, waist plates, right arm, and right leg, plus two hyper bazookas, a beam javelin, and a Gundam Hammer.

title: MS-06 Zaku II Custom Set #1
notes: Accessory kit for PG-02/03. Contains clear armor parts for the head, arms, lower legs, and feet, plus two bazookas, a chain hammer, and a beam javelin.

title: MS-06 Zaku II Custom Set #2
notes: Accessory kit for PG-02/03. Contains clear armor parts for the torso and thighs, plus a light-up heat hawk, two leg-mounted missile launchers, and two panzerfausts.

title: 00 Raiser Color Clear Body
notes: Clear armor parts for PG-13.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam LED Set
notes: Set of 30 LEDs (one for the head, 29 for the Psycoframe) for PG-15, PG-16, and Unicorn Gundam 03 Phenex. Requires four AA batteries.

title: LED Unit for Gundam Exia
notes: Set of LEDS for PG-17's inner frame that changes to green, blue, and red (requires four AA batteries on display base).

title: FA-78-1 Full Armor Gundam Conversion Parts
notes: Resin-cast upgrade kit for PG-01.

title: XXXG 00W0 Wing Gundam Zero Custom (Pearl Mirror Coating Ver.)
series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz
notes: Limited edition pearl metallic color variant of PG-05.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam 30th Anniversary Extra Finish Ver.
notes: Limited edition metallic color variant of PG-01.

title: MS-06F Zaku II 30th Anniversary Extra Finish Ver.
notes: Limited edition metallic color variant of PG-02.

title: GAT-X105+AQM/E-X01 Aile Strike Gundam + FX-550 Skygrasper 30th Anniversary Color Clear Ver.
notes: Limited edition clear color variant of PG-09 with PG-10.

title: GN-001 Gundam Exia [Lighting Model]
notes: Release of PG-17 with LED kit for inner frame that changes to green, blue, and red (requires four AA batteries on display base).

title: MBF-P02Kai Gundam Astray Red Frame Kai
notes: Re-release of PG-12 with "Tiger Pierce" katana, Tactical Arms IIL, new thigh armor and new backpack. Includes grey Action Base 1 to support Tactical Arms IIL in poses. Limited edition retail kit except in Japan, where it is a P-Bandai exclusive.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam (Chrome Metallic Ver.)
notes: JAF-CON 9 exclusive chrome metallic color variant of PG-01.

title: RX-78/C.A. Casval's Gundam (Metallic Coating Ver.)
notes: Gundam World 2002 in C3 exclusive metallic color variant of PG-01.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam (Gold Version)
notes: MG Special Mechanic Seal W Chance Campaign exclusive raffle prize variant of PG-01 with the armor parts plated in 24 karat gold. Only 30 units were made available worldwide. Most expensive Gunpla ever produced.

title: RX-78-3 Gundam "G-3"
notes: Bandai Museum exclusive color variant of PG-01.

title: MS-06S Char's Zaku II (Red Metal Version)
notes: Red chrome plated variant of PG-03, offered as a raffle prize for Bandai's Master Grade Special Mechanic Seal W campaign. Only 300 units produced.

title: MSZ-006 Zeta Gundam (Multi-Coating Ver.)
notes: 2004 Plamodel Radicon Show exclusive metallic color variant of PG-04.

title: RX-178 Gundam Mk-II (Multi-Coating Ver.)
notes: Chara Hobby 2005 exclusive metallic color variant of PG-06.

title: GAT-X105+AQM/E-X01 Aile Strike Gundam (Clear Pearl Shift Ver.)
notes: Chara Hobby 2006 exclusive clear pearl remold of PG-09 with PG-10.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam + Weapons (Animation Color Ver.)
notes: Gundam Expo 2006 exclusive color variant of PG-01 with weapons from Gundam Custom Set #2.

title: MS-06S Char's Zaku II (Full Color Coating Ver.)
notes: Gundam Expo 2006 exclusive metallic color variant of PG-03.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam (Kunio Okawara Illustration Image Color Version)
notes: Chara Hobby 2007 exclusive color variant of PG-01 in Real Type livery.

title: MS-06F Zaku II + Weapons (Animation Color Ver.)
notes: Chara Hobby 2008 exclusive color variant of PG-02 with weapons from Zaku II Custom Set #1 and #2.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam (Mastermind Japan x STRICT-G Ver.)
notes: STRICT-G/Gundam Front Tokyo exclusive matte black variant of PG-01 with custom tote bag.

title: MBF-P03 Gundam Astray Blue Frame
notes: P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of PG-12.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam Full Armor Unit
notes: P-Bandai exclusive accessory set for PG-15. Includes four beam gatling guns, one hyper bazooka, eight hand grenade units, two grenade launchers, two triple missile launcher pods, two shields, two propellant tanks with stands, and two hands.

title: PG 1/60 Expansion Unit Armed Armor VN/BS for RX-0 Unicorn Gundam 02 Banshee
notes: P-Bandai exclusive accessory set for PG-16. Includes Vibration Nails and Beam Smart gun.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam [Final Battle Ver.]
notes: P-Bandai exclusive release of PG-15 with the psychoframe in green instead of red. Includes three Shield Funnels and a clear Action Base 1.

title: MBF-P04 Gundam Astray Green Frame (7-Eleven Color Ver.)
notes: 7-Eleven Japan exclusive metallic color variant of PG-12.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam (7-Eleven Color Ver.)
notes: 7-Eleven Japan exclusive metallic color variant of PG-15.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam 03 Phenex
series: Mobile Suit Gundam UC: One of Seventy Two
notes: P-Bandai exclusive parts and gold chrome plated variant of PG-15.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam (Chrome Plated Version)
notes: Bandai Asia & Australia exclusive re-release of the JAF-CON 9 variant.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam (Real Type Color)
notes: Bandai Asia & Australia exclusive re-release of the Chara Hobby 2007 variant.

title: RX-78/C.A. Casval's Gundam
notes: Bandai Asia & Australia exclusive re-release of the Gundam World 2002 in C3 variant.

title: GN-0000+GNR-010 Trans-Am Raiser
notes: P-Bandai exclusive gloss injection color variant of PG-13. Includes Sparkle Clear Blue 2 Way Stand. Released to commemorate the 10th anniversary of Gundam 00.

title: GN-0000+GNR-010 Trans-Am Raiser Clear Color Body
notes: P-Bandai exclusive clear color armor and weapon parts kit for PG-13.

title: MBF-P02 Gundam Astray Red Frame [Metallic Ver.]
notes: The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive metallic color variant of PG-12.

title: RX-0(N) Unicorn Gundam 02 Banshee Norn [Final Battle Ver.]
notes: P-Bandai exclusive release of PG-16 with the psychoframe in green instead of gold. Includes green metallic water slide decal sheet.

title: GN-001RE Gundam Exia Repair Parts Set
notes: P-Bandai exclusive conversion kit for PG-17.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam 03 Phenex [Mastermind Japan Ver.]
series: Mobile Suit Gundam UC: One of Seventy Two
notes: STRICT-G Diver City Tokyo exclusive black chrome plated variant of Unicorn Gundam 03 Phenex.

title: MS-06S Char's Zaku II [Mastermind Japan Ver.]
notes: STRICT-G Diver City Tokyo exclusive black chrome plated variant of PG-03.

title: RX-78-3 Gundam "G-3" [Extra Finish]
notes: The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive metallic color variant of the Bandai Museum release.

title: Clear Color Body for GN-001 Gundam Exia
notes: P-Bandai exclusive clear color armor parts for PG-17.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam + Armed Armor DE [China Red Ver.]
series: Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn - Bande Dessinee
notes: Tmall.com exclusive color variant of PG-15 with yellow psychoframe and a color variant of PG-16's Armed Armor DE.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam [Final Battle Ver.] Gold Coating Ver.
notes: Exclusive gold chrome plated variant of PG-15 with green psychoframe. Offered as a gift of gratitude from Bandai to the Shanghai Police for their efforts in combating counterfeit gunpla and figures. Limited to 1 unit.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam Bande Dessinee Ver.
series: Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn - Bande Dessinee
notes: P-Bandai re-release of PG-15 with a color variant of PG-16's Armed Armor DE.

title: Perfect Strike Gundam Expansion Parts for Strike Gundam
notes: P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit to convert PG-09 into PG GAT-X105+AQM/E-YM1 Perfect Strike Gundam. Released to commemorate the 10th anniversary of P-Bandai.

title: GN-0000GNHW/7SG 00 Gundam Seven Sword/G Inspection
notes: P-Bandai exclusive color variant of PG-18. Includes additional water slide decal sheet.
